summary.span: 提供關聯之 Web 控制項的呈現功能，以修改特定瀏覽器的預設標記或行為。

span.span: Provides rendering capabilities for the associated Web control to modify the default markup or behavior for a specific browser.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別會調整關聯控制項來修改預設標記或特定瀏覽器的行為。The class adapts the associated control to modify the default markup or behavior for a specific browser. 您可以擴充類別，以進一步自訂轉譯的控制項。You can extend the class to further customize rendering of the control. 編譯接管網頁或控制項的生命週期中的一個或多個階段的.NET Framework 元件的介面卡。Adapters are compiled .NET Framework components that take over one or more stages in the life cycle of a page or control. 擴充類別會提供存取權的生命週期階段控制項。Extending the class will provide access to the life-cycle stages of the control. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[架構概觀的自動調整控制項行為](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ff05ae9-4109-4352-929e-ad893895dbff)。For more information, see [Architectural Overview of Adaptive Control Behavior](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ff05ae9-4109-4352-929e-ad893895dbff). 配接器的初始要求會導致.NET Framework 做為搜尋對應的配接器的特性，將要求瀏覽器控制項。The initial request for an adapter causes the .NET Framework to search for a mapped adapter for the control given the characteristics of the requesting browser. 瀏覽器定義檔案由找出用戶端瀏覽器的特性，並對應至瀏覽器類型的配接器的類別。Browser definition files are used by the class to identify the characteristics of the client browser and map the adapter to the browser type. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[架構概觀的自動調整控制項行為](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ff05ae9-4109-4352-929e-ad893895dbff)。For more information, see [Architectural Overview of Adaptive Control Behavior](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ff05ae9-4109-4352-929e-ad893895dbff). 如需 ASP.NET 和逐步解說，示範如何實作控制項配接器，並將它對應至控制項的適應性呈現架構的說明，請參閱 「 撰寫 ASP.NET 伺服器控制項配接器:: 簡介"在MSDNLibrary中[http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library).For a description of the adaptive rendering architecture of ASP.NET and a step-by-step walkthrough that shows how to implement a control adapter and map it to a control, see "Authoring ASP.NET Server Control Adapters: An Introduction" in the MSDN Library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何擴充類別來顯示控制項中啟用和停用狀態。The following code example shows how to extend the class to display a control in an enabled and disabled state. 這個範例包含三個部分：This example contains three parts: - 配接器會衍生自類別。An adapter derived from the class. - .Aspx 檔案，其中包含控制項和特定裝置的內容。The .aspx file that incorporates the control and device-specific content. - 要連結的裝置類型的配接器的瀏覽器檔案。A browser file to link the adapter to a device type. 下列程式碼範例示範如何擴充類別。The following code example demonstrates how to extend the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks .NET Framework 建構的執行個體類別。The .NET Framework constructs an instance of the class. 配接器的初始要求會導致.NET Framework 做為搜尋對應的配接器的特性，將要求瀏覽器控制項。The initial request for an adapter causes the .NET Framework to search for a mapped adapter for the control given the characteristics of the requesting browser. 找到之後，控制項保留中的對應配接器執行個體的參考其屬性。Once found, the control holds a reference to the mapped adapter instance in its property. 如需配接器對應和瀏覽器定義檔案的資訊，請參閱[架構概觀的自動調整控制項行為](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ff05ae9-4109-4352-929e-ad893895dbff)。For information on adapter mappings and browser definition files, see [Architectural Overview of Adaptive Control Behavior](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ff05ae9-4109-4352-929e-ad893895dbff).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會寫入相關聯為 HTML 的輸出資料流的控制項。The method writes the associated control to the output stream as HTML. 根據預設，.NET Framework 會呼叫 Web 伺服器控制項的自己方法。By default, the .NET Framework calls on the Web server control's own method. 不過，一旦設定該控制項的屬性時，.NET Framework 將會執行的配接器的實作透過關聯控制項的事件。However, once the property of that control is set, the .NET Framework will execute the adapter's implementation of the event over that of the associated control. 」 事件可用來執行修改裝置瀏覽器中呈現的標記程式碼。The event is used to perform modifications to the markup code that is rendered to a device browser. 在這裡進行控制項的生命週期和實際標記建立這個階段之前，應該設定控制項屬性。Control properties should be set prior to this phase of the life cycle and only the actual markup creation for the control done here. 生命週期的這個階段中的控制項所做的變更不會儲存檢視狀態。Changes made to the control in this stage of the life cycle are not saved to view state. 儲存至控制項所做的變更，覆寫事件。For saving changes made to the control, override the event. 事件也允許衍生的類別處理事件，而不用附加委派，它會處理衍生類別中的事件的慣用的技巧。The event also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate, which is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫方法以傳遞呈現，如果已啟用關聯的控制項的父控制項的物件。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method to pass the object to the parent control for rendering if the associated control is enabled. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class.
